title: ee mEnu galginandhuku
sahitya:
I mEnu galginanduku sItArAma nAmamE balkavalenu



anupallavi



kAmAdi durguNastOma pUritamaina pAmaratvamE gAni nEmamu lEnaTTi



caraNam 1



samsAramuna brOva dArini parahimsa jendu kirAtuDu hamsa rUpula 

     gati naDuga rAmanAma prashamsa jEsi upadEshinca dhanyuDu gAdA



caraNam 2



tApasi shApamiDagA jalOraga rUpamu goni uNDagA tApamu sairincaka 

      tallaDillaga shara cApadharuni nAma shravaNamu brOva lEdA



caraNam 3



karirAju teliyalEka baluDaina makaricEta gAsi jendagA aralEka nijamuna 

      Adi mUlamanaga varaduDu vEgamE vacci brOvaga lEdA



caraNam 4



Agama vEdamulanu dAnavuDu gompOvagA caturAnanuDu tyAgarAjanuta

      tAraka nAma ani bAguga nutimpa bhayamu dIrpagalEdA
